analysis.key_quote: I urge you to NOT institute Schedule F. It will spell near- and long-term doom to this country and its economy, people, and institutions.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and the dangers of politicizing expertise and public service. It highlights concerns about the integrity of scientific truth and the necessity of impartial governance, which align with the themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
